metadata.source: Nature Medicine (2023) - Heat-related mortality in Europe during the summer of 2022
metadata.notes: Italy-specific estimates. 2022 data: 18,010 deaths (95% CI = 13,793–22,225) from Nature Medicine. 2023 estimate based on EU-wide 47,690 deaths (Italy ~30%). Previous years based on Eurostat excess mortality patterns.
metadata.citation: Ballester, J., Quijal-Zamorano, M., Méndez Turrubiates, R.F. et al. Heat-related mortality in Europe during the summer of 2022. Nat Med 29, 1857–1866 (2023).
